de.embl.rieslab.emu.configuration.ui.tables

Class PropertiesTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • de.embl.rieslab.emu.configuration.ui.tables.PropertiesTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PropertiesTable
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    JPanel displaying a table allowing the user to allocate device properties from Micro-Manager with UIProperty from the current UI.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PropertiesTable

        public PropertiesTable(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UIProperty> uipropertySet,
                       MMPropertiesRegistry mmproperties,
                       HelpWindow help)
        Constructor called when no configuration exists. Creates a table with non-allocated fields.
        Parameters:
        uipropertySet - Map of the UI properties of the user interface indexed by their name.
        mmproperties - Object containing the device properties from the current Micro-manager session.
        help - Help window.

      • PropertiesTable

        public PropertiesTable(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UIProperty> uipropertySet,
                       MMPropertiesRegistry mmproperties,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> propertymapping,
                       HelpWindow help)
        Constructor called when modifying an existing configuration. Produces a table filled with preset fields. If the fields are not found, then creates non-allocated ones.
        Parameters:
        uipropertySet - UI properties map of the current UI.
        mmproperties - MM properties found in the current Micro-manager configuration.
        propertymapping - Mapping of UI and MM properties as read from a configuration.
        help - Help window.

    • Method Detail

      • showHelp

        public void showHelp(boolean b)
        Displays or hides the help window.
        Parameters:
        b - True if the help window is to be displayed.

      • getSettings

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getSettings()
        Extracts the fields filled by the user.
        Returns:
        HashMap of the UI properties and the corresponding MM properties and states value.

      • isStateValue

        public boolean isStateValue(java.lang.String s)
        Tests if the string has been generated by a SingelStateUIProperty, a TwoStateUIProperty, a MultiStateUIProperty or a RescaledUIProperty.
        Parameters:
        s - String to test, value in the first column of the table
        Returns:
        True if corresponds to a field value.
